quote: I don't know the question, but sex is definitely the answer.
author: Woody Allen

quote: sex is the consolation you have when you can't have love
author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez

quote: Sexcess—it’s about sex in excess and success all rolled up into one sweaty ball.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Has No Title

quote: Sex is like air; it's not important unless you aren't getting any.
author: John Callahan

quote: Everything in the world is about sex except sex. Sex is about power.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Sex is like an atom bomb. A potent weapon which fascinates and frightens. We're afraid to let it loose, yet we all have our finger on the button.”--Zeena Schreck, Cuir Underground: Sado-Magic for Satan Interview, 1998
author: Zeena Schreck,  Demons of the Flesh: The Complete Guide to Left Hand Path Sex Magic

quote: Waiting is erotic
author: Irène Némirovsky,  Suite Française

quote: The difference between sex and love is that sex relieves tension and love causes it.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Boredom: the desire for desires.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: libidinous, adj.I never understood why anyone would have sex on the floor. Until I was with you and I realized: you don't realize you're on the floor.
author: David Levithan,  The Lover's Dictionary

quote: When you've been around as long as me, Lucy, you'll know that there are three types of sex... One - brand-new, kitchen-table sex. Two - bedroom sex. Then number three - hallway sex, when you pass each other in the hallway and say 'Fuck you.'"- Lockie
author: Kathy Lette,  To Love, Honour And Betray

quote: Once you finish having sex, what is there to do but start over?
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Love with passion. Love for no reason.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Sex without love is a meaningless experience, but as far as meaningless experiences go its pretty damn good.
author: Woody Allen

quote: The behavior of a human being in sexual matters is often a prototype for the whole of his other modes of reaction in life.
author: Sigmund Freud,  Sexuality and the Psychology of Love

quote: Sex is part of nature. I go along with nature.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Sexual living is a reflection of God's love for us. It has two key qualities, which is faithfulness and creativity of new life.
author: Vincent Nichols

quote: Life is a disease: sexually transmitted, and invariably fatal.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: I believe that sex is one of the most beautiful, natural, wholesome things that money can buy.
author: Steve Martin

quote: I would argue that unless the two people are in love, all sex is bad sex, because why eat cotton candy when you can have edible clouds? Sure, it seems sweet at the time, but that’s just a carnival and carnal rush and wears off quickly. But love adds an extra dimension that takes an earthy thing like sex and makes it absolutely heavenly.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Perfect Sex [10w] Perfects sex balances the conflicting pleasures of submission and mastery.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: To fall in love with someone's thoughts - the most intimate, splendid romance.
author: Sanober Khan

quote: Kissing - and I mean like, yummy, smacking kissing - is the most delicious, most beautiful and passionate thing that two people can do, bar none. Better than sex, hands down.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: Love life, Live Love
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: Love, n. A temporary insanity curable by marriage.
author: Ambrose Bierce,  The Unabridged Devil's Dictionary

quote: A book is as private and consensual as sex.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Haunted

quote: Pleasure to me is wonder—the unexplored, the unexpected, the thing that is hidden and the changeless thing that lurks behind superficial mutability.
author: H.P. Lovecraft

quote: I understand by this passion the union of desire, friendship, and tenderness, which is inflamed by a single female, which prefers her to the rest of her sex, and which seeks her possession as the supreme or the sole happiness of our being.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: Sex could be a blissful communion,. But it could also be a weapon, and its absence, sometimes, was required for the establishment of peace.
author: Ann Brashares,  Girls In Pants: The Third Summer of the Sisterhood

quote: Women were excited after sex, wired becasue in their minds the relationship was on beginning. Men went to sleep m the because for the orgasm had arrived and the relationship was done.
author: Eric Jerome Dickey,  Pleasure

quote: To enjoy the magic of life, smile with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Good sex is like good bridge. If you don't have a good partner, you'd better have a good hand.
author: Mae West

quote: To feel the joy of life, smile with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Becoming hurts.
author: Kat Howard

quote: Sex had been amazing, but it wasn't a magical cure for everything. Damn. Somewhere along the way, I'd picked up common sense.
author: Richelle Mead,  Last Sacrifice

quote: The most total opposite of pleasure is not pain but boredom, for we are willing to risk pain to make a boring life interesting.
author: Peter Kreeft,  Jesus-Shock

quote: Calling sex by its name thereafter [the 17th c.] became more difficult and more costly. As if in order to gain mastery of it in reality, it had first been necessary to subjugate it at the level of language, control its free circulation in speech, expunge it from the things that were said, and extinguish the words that rendered it too visibly present.
author: Michel Foucault

quote: Self-respect. It would make me lovable. And it's the secret to good sex.
author: Susan Sontag,  As Consciousness is Harnessed to Flesh: Journals and Notebooks, 1964-1980

quote: Marriage, for a woman at least, hampers the two things that made life to me glorious - friendship and learning.
author: Jane Harrison

quote: If "facts"convinced people of things, no one would have sex
author: Glenn Hefley

quote: Love without judging. Love without reason.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: What's a fuck when what I want is love?
author: Henry Miller

quote: When certain parts of our bodies are touched, certain enzymes and chemicals that trigger sexual desire are released into our system. The more our bodies are stimulated, the more chemicals are released and the greater our sexual desire grows until it becomes a virtually unstoppable flood.
author: Myles Munroe,  Waiting and Dating

quote: INTENT reveals desire; ACTION reveals commitment.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: The good, the bad, and the ugly basically sums up my sex life. Except that I’ve never had the good.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the story my great-grandfather told my father, who then told my grandfather, who then told me about how The Mythical Mr. Boo, Charles Manseur Fizzlebush Grissham III, better known as Mr. Fizzlebush, and Orafoura are all in fact me...

quote: I want to write a book on sex. It will be filled with phrases like "Uuuhgh yeeeaaaah,"and "Ooooh that's it,"and "Whose hands are those?
author: Jarod Kintz,  I Want Two apply for a job at our country's largest funeral home, and then wear a suit and noose to the job interview.

quote: A thing worth having is a thing worth cheating for.
author: W.C. Fields

quote: I live for sex. I celebrate it, and relish the electricity of it, with every fibre of my being. I can see no better reason for being alive.
author: Fiona Thrust,  Naked and Sexual

quote: She had not made a decision to give up sex, only the clamor of romance, because it was exhausting her, doing her no good and too much harm...
author: Michelle Herman,  Dog

quote: This time when we kiss, I feel it in the pit of my stomach, I feel it in my heart. And I realize love isn't about sex. It's about connection.
author: Ellen Hopkins
